bibl.title: Columbia Papyri IX. The Vestis Militaris Codex.
bibl.note: 4 tabl., 1 diagramme, 5 figg., 1 carte et 12 pll.

Diss. Columbia Univ., 1990. - P. Col. IX, 247-248. - Part I: Nos 247. Account of the Vestis Militaris; - 248. Private Account. - Part II: Commentary: 1. The Vestis Militaris and the Uniform of the Roman Army; - 2. Clothing Deductions and Acquisition through the End of the Third Century; - 3. The Fourth Century and the Vestis Militaris; - 4. The Administration of the Hermopolite Nome. - Part III: Appendices: 1. Catalogue of Clothing Requisition Documents; - 2. Catalogue of Toponyms. - Bibliography. Index.
bibl.seg: SHERIDAN Jennifer A., Columbia Papyri IX. The Vestis Militaris Codex. (American Studies in Papyrology. 39.)
Atlanta, Georgia, Scholars Press, 1998, 8°, ix-174 pp., 4 tabl., 1 diagramme, 5 figg., 1 carte et 12 pll. ISBN 0-7885-0446-0. $44.95.

Diss. Columbia Univ., 1990. - P. Col. IX, 247-248. - Part I: Nos 247. Account of the Vestis Militaris; - 248. Private Account. - Part II: Commentary: 1. The Vestis Militaris and the Uniform of the Roman Army; - 2. Clothing Deductions and Acquisition through the End of the Third Century; - 3. The Fourth Century and the Vestis Militaris; - 4. The Administration of the Hermopolite Nome. - Part III: Appendices: 1. Catalogue of Clothing Requisition Documents; - 2. Catalogue of Toponyms. - Bibliography. Index.

C.R. par Jean Bingen, ChrEg 75 (2000) No. 150, pp. 355-357. - Sergio Daris, Aegyptus 78 (1998 [2000]) pp. 222-224. - Fritz Mitthof, Tyche 14 (1999) pp. 357-362. - Jonathan P. Roth, BMCRev < http://ccat.sas.upenn.edu/bmcr/2000/2000-03-26.html >. - Jean-Michel Carrié, AntTard 10 (2002) pp. 430-433. - J. David Thomas, JEA 89 (2003) pp. 288-290 [concerne aussi: P. Yale III].
